description: This file defines the 'Note' class, a public data model representing a note with properties such as id, title, content, timestamps, and sync status indicators. It includes constructors for creating instances and methods for copying, serializing to and from maps.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A data model class representing a note with properties for id, title, content, timestamps, and status flags for deletion and unsynced changes.

methods.name: Note.copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note instance with optional modifications to specified fields.

methods.name: Note.fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Note instance from a map/dictionary, handling different possible representations for boolean flags.

methods.name: Note.toMap
methods.description: Serializes the Note instance into a map suitable for storage or network transfer.
